data.title: Jennifer Lopez Reveals Abuse by Ex-Husband in Documentary
data.meta_description: Jennifer Lopez's documentary The Greatest Love Story Never Told, a part of her multimedia project, reveals her experiences with domestic abuse in relationships, including her toxic relationship with ex-husband Marc Anthony. She did not face physical violence to the point of being beaten up, but had been manhandled, hit, and disrespected. The documentary also shows Lopez's difficult childhood relationship with her parents and her journey to self-love. She tries to persuade actor Anthony Ramos to play a toxic suitor in her performance, but he pulls out, leaving dancer Gilbert Saldivar to take the role.
